typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		SOURCE_CODE_KEY as string,
		SOURCE_SYSTEM as string,
		TARGET_CODE as string,
		TARGET_DESCRIPTION as string,
		CODE_TYPE as string,
		CODE_TYPE_ID as double,
		CODE2 as string,
		OM_X_REF as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	format: 'parquet') ~> TCrossReference
source(output(
		coverage_code as string,
		coverage_desc as string,
		date_inserted as timestamp,
		date_updated as timestamp,
		energy_exp_group_code as string,
		energy_exp_group_desc as string,
		exposure_group_code as string,
		exposure_group_desc as string,
		gic_group_code as string,
		gic_group_desc as string,
		inserted_by as string,
		layer_group_code as string,
		layer_group_descr as string,
		pk_coverage_group as double,
		sort_order as double,
		updated_by as string,
		war_indicator as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	format: 'parquet') ~> CoverageGroup
TCrossReference filter(CODE_TYPE_ID == -3) ~> FilterProdGroups
TCrossReference filter(CODE_TYPE_ID == 122) ~> filterCoverageCodes
filterCoverageCodes select(mapColumn(
		coverage_source_code = SOURCE_CODE_KEY,
		source_system = SOURCE_SYSTEM,
		coverage_target_code = TARGET_CODE,
		coverage_target_desc = TARGET_DESCRIPTION,
		code_type = CODE_TYPE,
		code_type_id = CODE_TYPE_ID,
		code2 = CODE2
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> xRefCoverage
FilterProdGroups select(mapColumn(
		coverage_source_code = SOURCE_CODE_KEY,
		prd_group_target_code = TARGET_CODE,
		source_system = SOURCE_SYSTEM,
		prd_group_target_desc = TARGET_DESCRIPTION
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> xRefprodGroups
xRefCoverage, xRefprodGroups join(xRefCoverage@coverage_source_code == xRefprodGroups@coverage_source_code
	&& xRefCoverage@source_system == xRefprodGroups@source_system,
	joinType:'left',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> CoverageCodeProdGroup
DerviveProdGroupProdDesc aggregate(groupBy(coverage_target_code,
		product_group,
		product_descr,
		code2),
	coverage_target_desc = first(coverage_target_desc)) ~> Deduplicate
CoverageCodeProdGroup derive(product_group = coalesce(prd_group_target_code,'N/A'),
		product_descr = coalesce(prd_group_target_desc, 'Not Applicable')) ~> DerviveProdGroupProdDesc
Deduplicate, CoverageGroup lookup(coverage_target_code == coverage_code,
	multiple: false,
	pickup: 'any',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> LookupCoverageGroup
LastUpdatedBy select(mapColumn(
		pk_key = coverage_target_code,
		cov_description = coverage_target_desc,
		cov_exposure_group_code = exposure_group_code,
		cov_exposure_group_desc = exposure_group_desc,
		grp_key = product_group,
		grp_description = product_descr,
		cov_energy_exp_group_code = energy_exp_group_code,
		cov_energy_exp_group_desc = energy_exp_group_desc,
		cov_layer_group_code = layer_group_code,
		cov_layer_group_descr = layer_group_descr,
		cov_gic_group_code = gic_group_code,
		cov_gic_group_desc = gic_group_desc,
		cov_3ltr_code = code2,
		last_updated_by
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectOutputColumns
LookupCoverageGroup derive(last_updated_by = 'm_pre_dim_coverage') ~> LastUpdatedBy
SelectOutputColumns alterRow(upsertIf(!isNull(pk_key))) ~> AlterRow
AlterRow sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	format: 'parquet',
	partitionFileNames:['pre_dim_coverage.parquet'],
	partitionBy('hash', 1),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> preDimCoverageInsert
